explanation:
code_hardening: Added null checks for the HTTP response and Location header value, trimmed the header value before normalization, and declared locals as final where appropriate to improve safety and immutability.
resolve_compilation_errors: Added the @Override annotation to ensure the method correctly overrides DefaultRedirectHandler#getLocationURI, and used fully qualified names where necessary to avoid import ambiguity while relying on the existing REDIRECT_LOCATIONS constant.
exception_handling: Preserved wrapping of URISyntaxException into ProtocolException as in the original logic, and ensured no new unchecked exceptions are introduced by guarding against null header values.
logic_customization: Preserved redirect-handling logic exactly as-is, with the sole behavioral adjustment being trimming and replacing spaces with %20 in the Location header before URI parsing.
refactoring: Performed minor formatting cleanup and extracted the normalized Location value into a clearly named local variable without changing behavior.
misc: Updated inline comments to clarify the intentional normalization of the Location header; no new custom API calls were introduced (none).
